goals.description: Hero section with full-bleed dark background, gradient overlay, centered headline, subheadline, and two CTAs
goals.acceptance_criteria: Hero section visible with headline 'Endless Sushi & Hibachi, Made to Order', subheadline text, View Our Menu CTA (crimson), Order Online CTA (gold outline linking to simplemenu), min-height 90vh, Ken Burns zoom effect on background

steps: Verify hero section is visible with min-height 90vh
Verify both CTAs are present and styled correctly
Verify Order Online links to https://order.simplemenu.com/store/1810
test_scenario.visual_check: Dark hero with crimson and gold CTAs, centered text, professional appearance

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: A dramatic, full-screen dark hero that immediately communicates premium Japanese dining. The headline is large and centered, CTAs are clearly distinct in crimson and gold.
minimum_viable_signals: Headline says 'Endless Sushi & Hibachi, Made to Order'
Two CTAs visible with correct colors
Dark background with no white/light areas
Order Online links to simplemenu URL

goals.description: Concept section explaining made-to-order dining with stats
goals.acceptance_criteria: Split-screen layout with headline 'Not a Buffet. A Celebration.' and body text explaining the concept. Stats showing 100+ Menu Items, 4 Florida Locations, Since 2011 in gold accent. Background #1C1C1C.

steps: Verify stats are present with correct values
test_scenario.visual_check: Split layout with text and stats on dark surface background

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: An elegant section that clearly communicates Koizi is NOT a buffet, with impressive stats highlighted in gold.
minimum_viable_signals: Headline says 'Not a Buffet. A Celebration.'

goals.description: Tabbed menu section with real menu data across 7 categories
goals.acceptance_criteria: Tabbed navigation with 7 categories (Signature Rolls, Classic Rolls, Sushi & Sashimi, Hibachi, Appetizers, Entrees, Kids Menu). Each tab shows 8-12 items with real names, descriptions, prices. Cards on #2A2A2A with hover lift. Gold underline on active tab. Popular badges on specified items.

steps: Verify tab navigation with all 7 categories
Click each tab and verify items appear
Verify Popular badges on specified items
test_scenario.visual_check: Tabbed menu with gold active indicator, dark cards with real menu data

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: A beautifully organized menu with working tabs, real prices, and appetizing presentation on dark cards.
minimum_viable_signals: Real menu item names and prices visible

goals.description: Reviews section with ratings and customer testimonials carousel
goals.acceptance_criteria: Centered section with large 4.2 rating, Google stars, '3,450+ Reviews & Counting' headline. Horizontal scroll carousel with real review quotes. Google (4.2/5, 2800 reviews) and Yelp (3.4/5, 650 reviews) ratings shown.

steps: Verify real review quotes are shown
test_scenario.visual_check: Large rating display with star visualization, scrollable review cards

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: A trust-building section with prominent ratings and real customer quotes that make visitors want to try Koizi.

goals.description: Gallery section with masonry grid of food photography
goals.acceptance_criteria: Masonry grid with 'Every Dish, A Work of Art' headline. 3 columns desktop, 2 tablet, 1 mobile. Uses Unsplash sushi/hibachi images. Gold border glow on hover.

steps: Verify hover effect with gold glow
test_scenario.visual_check: Masonry grid of high-quality food images with gold hover effect

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: A visually stunning grid of food photos that showcases the quality of Koizi dishes.
minimum_viable_signals: Headline says 'Every Dish, A Work of Art'

goals.description: Locations section with 4 location cards in 2x2 grid
goals.acceptance_criteria: 2x2 grid with '4 Locations Across Florida' headline. Each card has address, phone, hours. Tampa Palms has 'Original Location' gold badge. Crimson accent bar at top of each card. Real addresses and phone numbers.

steps: Verify Tampa Palms address: 17012 Palm Pointe Dr
Verify Original Location badge on Tampa Palms
test_scenario.visual_check: 2x2 grid of dark location cards with crimson accents and gold badge

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: A clear locations grid showing all 4 Florida locations with real addresses, making it easy for visitors to find their nearest Koizi.
minimum_viable_signals: Original Location badge on Tampa Palms

goals.description: Ordering CTA banner and About section
goals.acceptance_criteria: Full-width banner with 'Ready to Feast?' headline in gold. Order Online CTA linking to simplemenu. Call to Reserve CTA linking to tel:8139711919. DoorDash/Uber Eats/Grubhub mentioned. About section with 'A Tampa Tradition Since 2011' headline.

steps: Verify Order Online links to simplemenu
Verify Call to Reserve links to phone
test_scenario.visual_check: Bold CTA banner with gold headline and crimson/gold buttons

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: A compelling call-to-action that drives online orders and reservations, followed by an authentic about section.
minimum_viable_signals: Ready to Feast headline in gold

goals.description: Footer with 3-column layout on dark background
goals.acceptance_criteria: 3-column layout on #0A0A0A. Col 1: Tampa Palms address + phone. Col 2: Hours. Col 3: Connect links (Order Online, Instagram @koizi_sushi_and_hibachi, Yelp, TripAdvisor). Copyright 2026.

steps: Verify address and phone in col 1
test_scenario.visual_check: Dark footer with organized columns and real contact info

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: A clean, dark footer with all essential contact info organized in three columns.

goals.description: Consistent dark theme with CSS variables and responsive design across all viewports
goals.acceptance_criteria: All CSS variables defined in globals.css. section-padding utility class used on every section. Consistent max-w-6xl containers. No hardcoded hex colors in components. Typography scale follows spec. Fully responsive on mobile/tablet/desktop. NO white/light backgrounds anywhere.

steps: Check components for hardcoded hex values
test_scenario.visual_check: Consistent dark theme across all sections, proper spacing, responsive layout

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: A cohesive dark-themed design where every section feels like it belongs to the same premium restaurant website.
minimum_viable_signals: CSS variables for all brand colors

goals.description: SEO optimization with meta tags, structured data, and accessibility
goals.acceptance_criteria: Proper title tag, meta description, Open Graph tags. Restaurant structured data (JSON-LD). WCAG AA contrast ratios. Semantic HTML. Fast loading target.

steps: Check page source for meta tags
Check contrast ratios on key elements

outcome_definition.what_good_looks_like: A website that ranks well in search, loads fast, and is accessible to all users.
